section_title: Repeal of s. 22(1) of the Sale of Goods Act 1979.
section_text: 1 Section 22 (1) (relating to the sale of goods in market overt) of the  Sale of Goods Act 1979 is hereby repealed.

2 1 Section 47 of the  Laws in Wales Act 1542 (sale of stolen goods in a fair or market in Wales) is hereby repealed. 2 In section 7(3) of the  Sea Fisheries (Shellfish) Act 1967 (protection of fisheries for shellfish), the words “sold in market overt or” shall be omitted.

3 1 This Act may be cited as the Sale of Goods (Amendment) Act 1994. 2 This Act shall apply to any contract for sale of goods which is made after this Act comes into force. 3 This Act shall come into force at the end of the period of two months beginning with the day on which it is passed. 4 Section 1 and this section extend to Northern Ireland.
